props.label: A.5a Reporting period (i.e. contract period) start date
props.hint: Enter start date of the reporting period represented in the report.

props.label: A.5b Reporting period  (i.e. contract period) end date

props.label: Exclusion of CHIP from MCPAR
props.hint: For Medicaid-only or Medicaid Expansion CHIP programs, select this checkbox if there are reporting items for which the state is unable to remove Separate CHIP information.

choices.name: aep-combinedData-o1
choices.label: Yes, the report contains items for which the state is unable to remove Separate CHIP information
